definitions: To touch, strike, or kick with the toe or toes.
To walk with the toes pointed in a specified direction.
To make or repair the toe of (a stocking or shoe).
To come or bring to a specified line or mark with the toes.
examples: He will toe the ball into the net.
She learned to toe out when she walked.
The cobbler will toe the worn shoes.
He had to toe the nail to secure the board.
All the runners must toe the starting line.
